resources.name: create user
resources.description:
> all fields are required

``` json
	{
		"name": "joe",
		"email": "mail@mail.com",
		"password": "password",
		"telefone": "12345678"
	}
```

### return sucess 

```json response:200
	{
		"id": "number",
		"name": "joe",
		"email": "mail@mail.com",
		"telefone": "12345678",
		"createdAt": "date"
	}
```

### return errors

whithout field

``` json
	 {
		 
	 }
``` 

return 
> status code 400

``` json
	{
		"name": "Required",
		"email":"Required",
		"telefone": "Required",
		"password":"Required"
	}
```

invalid fields

``` json
		{
			"name":123,  
			"email":"123",  
			"password":1234,  
			"telefone":1234  
		}
```

return 
> status code 400

``` json
	{
		"name": [
			"Expected string, received number"
		],
		"email": [
			"Invalid email"
		],
		"telefone": [
			"Expected string, received number"
		],
		"password": [
			"Expected string, received number"
		]
	}
```

resources.name: users
resources.description: # criar, fazer login, listar, editar e deletar

resources.name: login
get users
resources.description:
> no body required  
> token is required

### return sucess 
> status code 200

```json
	[
		{
			"id": "number",
			"name":"string",
			"email":"email",
			"telefone":"telefone",
			"createdAt":"date"
		},
		{
			"id": "number",
			"name":"string",
			"email":"email",
			"telefone":"telefone",
			"createdAt":"date"
		}
	]
```

### return errors

without bearer token 
> statuscode 401

```json
	{
		"message": "token is missing"
	}
```

bearer token user not owern or admin
> status code 401

```json
	{
		"message": "has not permission"
	}
```

bearer token malformed 
> status code 403

```json
	{
		"message": "jwt malformed"
	}
```

resources.name: delete user
resources.description:
> token is required  
> user need to be owner  
> no body required

### return sucess

> status code 209

no body returned for response

### return errors

without bearer token 
> statuscode 401

```json
	{
		"message": "token is missing"
	}
```

bearer token user not owner or admin
> status code 401

```json
	{
		"message": "has not permission"
	}
```

bearer token malformed 
> status code 403

```json
	{
		"message": "jwt malformed"
	}
```

resources.name: update user
resources.description:
> all fields are optional  
> Bearer token is required  
> user need to be owner 

body
``` json
	{
		"name": "joe",
		"email": "mail@mail.com",
		"password": "password",
		"telefone": "12345678"
	}
```

### return sucess 
> status code 200

``` json
	{
		"id":"number",
		"name": "joe",
		"email": "mail@mail.com",
		"telefone": "12345678",
		"createdAt":"date"
	}

```

### return errors

without bearer token 
> statuscode 401

```json
	{
		"message": "token is missing"
	}
```

bearer token user not owner or admin
> status code 401

```json
	{
		"message": "has not permission"
	}
```

bearer token malformed 
> status code 403

```json
	{
		"message": "jwt malformed"
	}
```

email exists
> status code 409

```json
	{
		"message": "user Email already exists"
	}
```

resources.name: get all contacts
resources.description:
> no body required  
> token is required  
> need be admin

### return sucess
> status code 200

```json
	[
		{
			"id": "number",
			"name":"string",
			"email":"email",
			"telefone":"telefone",
			"createdAt":"date"
		},
		{
			"id": "number",
			"name":"string",
			"email":"email",
			"telefone":"telefone",
			"createdAt":"date"
		}
	]
```

resources.name: get user contacts
resources.description:
> no body required  
> token is required

### return sucess
> status code 200

```json
	{
		"id": "number",
		"name": "string",
		"email": "email",
		"telefone": "telefone",
		"createdAt": "date time",
		"contacts": [
			{
				"id": "number",
				"CreatedAt": "date",
				"contact": {
					"id": "number",
					"name": "string",
					"email": "email",
					"telefone": "telefone",
					"createdAt": "date"
				}
			},
			{
				"id": "number",
				"CreatedAt": "date",
				"contact": {
					"id": "number",
					"name": "string",
					"email": "email",
					"telefone": "telefone",
					"createdAt": "date"
				}
			}
		]
	}
```

### return errors

without bearer token 
> statuscode 401

```json
	{
		"message": "token is missing"
	}
```

bearer token user not owern or admin
> status code 401

```json
	{
		"message": "has not permission"
	}
```

bearer token malformed 
> status code 403

```json
	{
		"message": "jwt malformed"
	}
```
